name: Dark Weezing

attacks.name: Mass Explosion
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the total number of Koffings, Weezings, and Dark Weezings in play (Apply Weakness and Resistance.). Then, this attack does 20 damage to each Koffing, Weezing, and Dark Weezing (even your own). Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

attacks.name: Stun Gas
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned; if tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Researchers have observed these Pokémon reproducing in industrial waste sites.

strengths: Mass Explosion can deal huge damage with multiple Koffing/Weezing
Stun Gas guarantees a status condition
weaknesses: Mass Explosion damages your own Pokemon too
Requires building deck around Koffing family

competitiveHistory: Dark Weezing enabled a unique 'explosion' deck strategy. With multiple Koffing and Weezing family members in play, Mass Explosion could deal massive damage for just one energy. The self-damage to all Koffing/Weezing made it a high-risk, high-reward strategy. Stun Gas providing guaranteed status conditions made it versatile - you either Poison or Paralyze, never miss.

rulings.ruling: Mass Explosion counts all Koffing, Weezing, and Dark Weezing in play - both yours and your opponent's.
The 20 damage to each Koffing/Weezing/Dark Weezing does not apply Weakness or Resistance.
Stun Gas always inflicts a status condition - Poison on heads, Paralyzed on tails.
